keyMoments.title: Crew Members Trapped by Mr. 3
keyMoments.description: Nami and Zoro are captured by Mr. 3's wax traps while navigating Little Garden's jungle.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew being separated and vulnerable to Baroque Works' coordinated attack.

keyMoments.title: Confrontation with Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Usopp, and Vivi are attacked by Baroque Works agents at Dorry's camp.
keyMoments.significance: The crew faces multiple threats simultaneously across Little Garden.

description: Luffy's pirate crew sailing through the Grand Line, currently helping Princess Vivi stop Baroque Works.
